title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, March 19, 2021
description: One hundred years ago today adventurer, translator, and writer Richard Francis Burton, was born.  His accomplishments include translating both “The Arabian Nights” and “The Kama Sutra."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: One hundred years ago today adventurer, translator, and writer Richard Francis Burton, was born.  His accomplishments include translating both “The Arabian Nights” and “The Kama Sutra."
